header.title: We develop Microbiological Solutions for agriculture and the environment

what_we_do.title: We promote crop growth in extreme environments and under abiotic stress.

how_we_do.title: How we do it?
how_we_do.description: We carry microbes towards the soil on seeds, to boost plant growth and recover soil biodiversity

how_we_do.formulation: Formulation improves shelf-life, survival on seed
